meta.name: TQQQ For The Long Term V4 | No Better QQQ/SingleStocks | Pietros Maneos & Raekon mod v1 | 248.9%/46.1%DD from 28 Oct 2011 | 10 YR Annualized Return 278.7 | 6.05 Calmar Ratio
meta.description: Made by /u/derecknielsen & V3 is modified by Garen Phillips.  Pietros Maneos was hesitant to use single stocks, so he amended the Better QQQ with LETFs. Raekon modified some of the ETF choices in order to boost gains while simultaneously lowering the number of trading days, which will give even better tax adjusted returns.
